item.title: Gitup - best free git GUI for mac
item.description: Hey I wanna share great free git GUI for mac which I like to use and it’s not so well known - http://gitup.co/

item.title: Small git tips
item.description: The cool think I didn’t knew is that when you type git checkout - it returns to previous branch. The same applies to shell cd - returns to previous catalog, so you don’t have to use pushd path && popd Also the default for cd is cd ~ [embarrassed]. And when we are talking about cd - I recommend this great utility tool - https://github.com/rupa/z - it’s “fuzzy finder” for cd
